fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Choose a card type. Force someone to randomly discard 1 card at the start of the phase, prioritizing the card type you chose.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Choose a card type. Force someone to randomly discard 3 cards at the start of the next phase, prioritizing the card type you chose.

*This will take effect after a player has discarded down to their hand limit.*
